headline: Vardhman Special Steels (-1.06%) :  Estimates Around 245,000 Tons Volume For FY27, Aiming For Full Capacity Of 270,000 Tons By FY28, With EBITDA Per Ton Ranging From INR8,000-11,000, Possibly Rising To INR8,000-12,000 Or INR9,000-12,000
